value.title: How to choose which services to use in Azure | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In this video, Azure MVP Barry Luijbregts chats with Scott Hanselman about how he goes about choosing the right services in Azure to run his applications and store his data.   For more information, see:  • Overview of Azure services https://aka.ms/azfr/435/01  • Pluralsight course: Microsoft Azure for

value.title: Create Intelligent Bots with the Azure Bot Service
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how to build a chat bot to interact with customers using text, graphics, or speech with extras from QnA Maker and LUIS.

topItems.title: Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create a bot that answers frequently asked questions.

value.title: Build Azure Resource Manager templates
value.excerpt: Learn how Resource Manager templates express your deployments as code, enabling you to deploy faster and more reliably.

value.title: Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a bot that answers frequently asked questions.

value.title: Expose multiple Azure Function apps as a consistent API by using Azure API Management
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to assemble multiple Azure Functions into a single API using Azure API Management.

value.title: Create a classification model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Classification is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict categories or classes. Learn how to create classification models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale
value.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Cosmos DB account, database, and container built to scale as your application grows.

value.title: Create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Learn how to create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC).

value.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure
value.excerpt: This module guides you through options for virtual machines in Azure, creating and connecting a Linux virtual machine, and configuring your network settings.

value.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse
value.excerpt: Examine components of a modern data warehouse

value.title: Execute an Azure Function with triggers
value.excerpt: This module demos some of the most common types of triggers for executing Azure Functions and how to configure them to execute your logic.

value.title: Explain DevOps Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality
value.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality.

value.excerpt: Explore relational data offerings in Azure

value.title: Host a web application with Azure App service
value.excerpt: Create a website in the programming language of your choice through the hosted web app platform in Azure App Service.

value.title: Introduction to the Microsoft commercial marketplace
value.excerpt: Overview of the Microsoft commercial marketplace, including Microsoft AppSource, Azure Marketplace, offer types, and Marketplace Rewards

value.title: Introduction to Python
value.excerpt: Learn about the Python programming language, how to execute statements and scripts, declare variables, and create a basic Python app.

value.title: Query relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Query relational data in Azure

value.title: How to create a virtual machine in Azure | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: Azure provides multiple virtual machine configuration options for you to set up your virtual machine exactly how you want for whatever you're trying to do. In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how to configure a basic virtual machine and connect to it in minutes in the Azure portal.

value.title: How to create, host, and share packages with Azure Artifacts | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use Azure Artifacts, an Azure DevOps service, to set up a feed for sharing packages with your team.    For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips   Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account

value.title: How to quickly connect to a Linux VM with SSH | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to quickly connect to a Linux Virtual Machine (VM) with secure shell (SSH). If you have Linux VMs that are running inside of Microsoft Azure, you can easily establish an SSH connection.    For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips/

value.excerpt: Learn how to use cost analysis to understand how your costs accrue each month.

value.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
value.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

value.title: Microsoft Azure IoT strategy and solutions
value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure IoT, and describes Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure. This knowledge can help bring IoT to life for your organization and customers.

value.title: Choose a messaging model in Azure to loosely connect your services
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure's storage queues, event hubs, event grid, and service bus can improve your communication between devices.

value.excerpt: Create a simple application and add configuration, client library references, and C# or JavaScript code to connect it to Azure Storage.
